titles.title: A resolution modifying extended debate in the Senate to improve the legislative process.
A resolution modifying extended debate in the Senate to improve the legislative process.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution amends Rule XXII (Precedence of Motions) of the Standing Rules of the Senate to modify the rules for extended debate in the Senate, including the procedures for a filibuster and invoking cloture.
